episodes.title: Victim to Verdict: Doomsday Cult Mom Case
episodes.description: Last May Lori Vallow Daybell, known to some as the "Doomsday Cult Mom," was convicted in the murders of her two children, JJ Vallow and Tylee Ryan, and her husband’s previous wife Tammy Daybell. A tragic case with allegations of cult-like religious beliefs centered around doomsday prophecies. Now Lori’s husband and alleged co-conspirator, Chad Daybell, prepares to face a jury himself. This week’s Court TV Podcast features an audio edition of our original series Victim to Verdict with Ted Rowlands, which takes a closer look at the case against Lori Vallow Daybell and Chad’s alleged role in the web of mysterious deaths that surrounds them. For more on The Doomsday Couple case, Click Here.

episodes.title: LIVE: ID v. Lori Vallow Daybell - Sentencing Doomsday Cult Mom Trial
episodes.description:
LIVE COURT CAM - ID v. Lori Vallow Daybell | SENTENCING: Lori Vallow Daybell is facing life in prison after being convicted in the deaths of her two children and conspiring to kill her fifth husband's previous wife.

Back in May, the so-called Doomsday Cult Mom was convicted of first-degree murder in the deaths of 16-year-old Tylee Ryan and 9-year-old JJ Vallow, and conspiring to kill Tammy Daybell. She was also found guilty of grand theft. The kids' bodies were found buried on Chad Daybell's Freemont County, Idaho property in 2020.

Some family members and Lori Vallow Daybell herself will have an opportunity to speak before Judge Boyce hands down the sentence.

*TRIAL NOTES:*
00:00:00 Introduction
00:17:58 Judge Boyce Takes the Bench
00:30:37 Victim Impact Statements
00:55:32 VICTIM IMPACT STATEMENT #4 - Kay Woodcock // JJ’s biological grandmother
01:25:41 State sentencing recommendation
02:45:26 Defense sentencing recommendation
03:04:11 Lori Vallow Speaks At Sentencing // Defendant
03:13:31 Judge’s ruling

MORE HERE: https://www.courttv.com/news/lori-vallow-daybell-sentencing-what-to-expect/
#CourtTV #doomsdaycultmom #lorivallowdaybell

https://www.courttv.com/title/court-tv-live-stream-web/?trk=YouTube

episodes.title: LISTEN | Lori Vallow Daybell: New Trial Hearing
episodes.description:
#CourtTV AUDIO PODCAST: Convicted killer Lori Vallow Daybell is back in court seeking a new trial after a juror spoke after the verdict. In May, Lori was found guilty on six criminal counts, including the murders of her two children, Tylee Ryan and JJ Vallow, and conspiracy in the death of her fifth husband’s first wife, Tammy Daybell.

In their motion, defense attorneys argued the jury instructions were confusing. The defense also said that they believe that the jury was influenced by “outside sources,” and at least one of the jurors had information that was not entered into evidence. Attorneys say that information came to light during a post-trial interview with East Idaho News.

MORE HERE: https://www.courttv.com/trending/id-v-vallow-daybell-doomsday-cult-couple/
#LoriVallowDaybell #Juror8

episodes.title: PODCAST: Doomsday Cult Mom - After the Verdict | COURT TV
episodes.description:
COURT TV PODCAST: On May 12th, Lori Vallow Daybell was found guilty on all charges against her in the deaths of her two children, Tylee Ryan and JJ Vallow, as well as the death of her husband’s previous wife, Tammy Daybell.

Host Vinnie Politan and Court TV Legal Correspondent Chanley Painter unpack the final moments of her trial, the reaction of JJ’s grandparents to the verdict, and what’s next for Lori and her husband Chad, who still awaits trial for his alleged role in these murders.

episodes.title: ID v. Lori Vallow Daybell | Day 16 Doomsday Cult Mom Trial
episodes.description:
COURT AUDIO: ID v. Lori Vallow Daybell | DAY 16 - "She threatened to cut me up and bury me." Former friend, Audrey Barattiero testifies about spending time with Lori and Chad Daybell while they were married to other people. Ian Pawlowski, the defendant's nephew, testifies about Lori's religious beliefs.

*HIGHLIGHTS*
- Lori’s friend, Audrey Barattiero, talked about two separate times when Lori wanted to work on Charles and Tammy. This made Audrey feel uncomfortable.
- Audrey also talked about a time when Lori called her naïve before threatening to cut her up and bury her.
- Looked into Alex’s firearm, he had a 6.5mm Grendel with a vortex scope which could’ve been misconstrued as a paintball hopper (the item that holds the paintballs).
- Ian Pawlowski said after a few days of listening to Lori’s religious beliefs, he was not open to hearing any more of this. He said that she talked about being possessed and rankings about light and dark, which he found alarming.

- Detective followed up on Lori’s supposed whereabouts in the minutes after Charles Vallow’s death.
- Lori went to Burger King for JJ, Walgreens to allegedly buy flip flops for the kids, dropped JJ of at school, then returned to the residence.
- Lori spoke to a detective. After, they notified her of Charles’ death, Lori responded that she already knew this.
- April Raymond said Lori asked her to join 144,000 and that if she did join, she had to leave her children with their father.

episodes.description:
DOOMSDAY CULT MOM: ID v. Lori Vallow Daybell | The defendant's ex-best friend, Melanie Gibb, took the stand on Day 4 in Lori Vallow Daybell's murder trial. Gibb tracked Chad and Lori’s extramarital relationship from a 2018 religious conference to a November 2019 phone call.

episodes.title: LISTEN: ID v. Vallow Daybell | Det. Ray Hermosillo PT1, Day 2
episodes.description:
DOOMSDAY CULT MOM: ID v. Lori Vallow Daybell |Rexburg police Detective Ray Hermosillo, who first got involved in the case in Nov. 2020, takes the stand. Det. Hermosillo walks the jury through crime scene photos at Chad Daybell's property, where Tylee and JJ's remains were recovered.

episodes.title: LISTEN: ID v. Lori Vallow Daybell | Kay Woodcock, Day 1
episodes.description:
COURT CAST: Doomsday Cult Mom Trial, ID v. Lori Vallow Daybell - Opening Statements |  Kay Woodcock, the sister of Lori Vallow's late husband Charles Vallow, takes the stand. Woodcock is also JJ Vallow's grandmother.

Lori Vallow Daybell is facing life in prison if convicted of murdering her two children, JJ Vallow & Tylee Ryan, and conspiring to kill her fifth husband’s previous wife Tammy Daybell.   Per Judge's orders, no cameras are allowed for the proceedings. 

#CourtTV MORE HERE: https://www.courttv.com/trending/id-v-vallow-daybell-doomsday-cult-couple/
